overview: The Diary of an Affiliate is the true story of Antonio Perrone. It is the story of a young man like many others who, trying to pursue the dream of the good life, finds himself involved in an unstoppable rush that transforms him from a common university student into a true mafia boss. A dark tale with in the background a mafia never described before: the Sacred United Crown.  (IMDB)
title: Diario di uno “Scuro”
